answers.author: Sandra Tripp-Jones
answers.text:
Dear Rudolf,  I have confirmed that you indeed passed the exam.  I am working with GLDN and World Bank to get you a certificate.  I do not know why you did not get it already, but what matters is that we get you one, and we will.  Also, I recall that you wanted information on financing for climate change adaptation projects.  I did get some information on that but I will have to dig it up again.  so you will get another communication from me soon.  Thank you very much for participating in the MFTC program.  I hope you found it worthwhile.
Best Regards,
Sandra

author: Hutauruk, Rudolf
text: I have attended the Municipal Finance Training Certification (ASEAN II) at Jakarta last May 2012 and have already been informed by your side that I have passed the examination (over all above 70% grade) at the end of that program, however, I have received its certification yet. I just want to make a clarification when I should receive it? Hoping to see your reply soon. Thank you
title: Municipal Finance Training Certification ASEAN II Group
